Skill Description: When stationed at Reception, clue collection speed +20%
When stationed at a Trade Station, order limit +3 and mood reduction per hour -0.25
When stationed at the Synthesis Station and producing any kind of material, increase the rate of by-products by 40%
When stationed at a Craft Station, increase production of precious metals by +35%
When stationed at the Synthesis Station and producing infrastructure materials, increase the rate of by-products by 70%
When stationed at a Power Station, drone recovery per hour +15%
When stationed at the Command Center, mood reduction per hour of other operatives in the Command Center -0.05
When stationed at Reception, clue collection speed +25%

When stationed at a Dorm, increase mood recovery of one random operator below maximum mood except self within that dorm by +0.25 per hour (When stacked, only the highest effect becomes active); At the same time, self mood recovery per hour +0.5
When stationed at a Trade Station, order acquisition efficiency +15% and order limit +2
When stationed at the Training Station, reduce the skill training time of Specialist operatives by -30%
When stationed at the Training Station, reduce the skill training time of Specialist operatives by -50%
When stationed at a Craft Station, increase production of EXP cards by +30%
When stationed at a Craft Station, increase production of EXP cards by +35%
